tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE transaction_data (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    is_fraud BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    fraud_flag BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_login TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE users (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    username VARCHAR(50),
    email VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(15),
    registration_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE alerts (
    alert_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INT,
    user_id INT,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50),
    alert_date TIMESTAMP
);
CREATE TABLE users ( user_id INT PRIMARY KEY, username VARCHAR(255), email VARCHAR(255), created_at TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE transactions ( transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), transaction_date TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE accounts ( account_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, account_number VARCHAR(50), balance DECIMAL(10, 2) );
CREATE TABLE suspicious_transactions ( transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, user_id INT, amount DECIMAL(10, 2), transaction_date TIMESTAMP );
CREATE TABLE fraud_cases ( case_id INT PRIMARY KEY, fraud_description TEXT, status VARCHAR(50), resolved BOOLEAN, resolved_date TIMESTAMP );
